TopicTitle: Glowing grass at KSC with RSS

Articles.Content:
I've installed RP-1 via express install with RSS (KSP 1.12.5), and I have this strange grass glow on KSC tiles. It's gone when I'm just next to the runway but appears at some distance. I didn't change any graphic mods settings. Is it normal or can I somehow fix it?

 

Here is the mod list: 

Advanced Jet Engine (AdvancedJetEngine v2.20.0)
